title: A Ramble on Rebel Wisdom's  John Vervaeke - Iain McGilchrist Convo -  with Quality!
description:
What a great interview this was! And I guess you could say this is a right-hemisphere directed analysis!

https://www.hhimwich.com/files/undifferentiated-aesthetic-continuum.pdf
http://www.oturn.net/rugs/tor/alexander.html
https://www.original.moq.org/ (look for Pirsig's essay here under essays. No direct link)
